alert.note: Alert for Lonoke (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 12 at 4:32AM CST until January 12 at 4:45AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM CST FOR CENTRAL LONOKE COUNTY... At 431 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Sisemore, or over Lonoke, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Lonoke... Sisemore... TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
